meaningMnemonic: The sound of <radical>spring</radical> <radical>water</radical> always puts you at <kanji>peace</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: You want to feel this <kanji>peace</kanji> all the time, not just in spring, so you dip your <reading>tie</reading> (たい) in the spring water. Now your tie is making the peaceful dripping sounds you love.
